src:
Prediksi Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera 4 November 2019
04 Nov 2019, 09:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan tanpa kemenangan dalam dua laga terakhirnya. Itu membuat Persela tertahan di zona merah. Melawan Barito Putera di kandang sendiri, Persela tentu mengincar poin maksimal. Namun, Barito tak ingin pulang dengan tangan hampa.
Persela Lamongan akan menjamu Barito Putera pada pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019, Senin (4/11/2019). Pertandingan ini akan digelar di Stadion Surajaya, Lamongan.
Persela saat ini menempati peringkat 16 dengan perolehan 24 poin dari 25 pertandingan (M5 S9 K11). Sementara itu, Barito berada di posisi 12 dengan 29 poin dari 26 laga (M7 S8 K11).
Dalam dua laga terakhirnya, setelah menang 1-0 menjamu Persebaya Surabaya, Persela ditekuk tuan rumah Kalteng Putra 0-2 dan imbang 1-1 di kandang Bali United. Sementara itu, Barito menang empat kali dan cuma kalah sekali dalam enam laga terakhir.
Di pekan sebelumnya, Barito menang 1-0 menjamu Borneo FC. Itu menjadi modal bagus bagi mereka untuk lawatan ke Lamongan.
text:
Prediction Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera 4 November 2019
Nov 04 2019, 09:34 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan without a win in the last two games. That makes Persela stuck in the red zone. Against Barito Putera at home, Persela is certainly eyeing maximum points. However, Barito did not want to go home empty-handed.
Persela Lamongan will host Barito Putera in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019, Monday (11/04/2019). This match will be held at Surajaya Stadium, Lamongan.
Persela is currently ranked 16th with 24 points from 25 matches (M5 S9 K11). Meanwhile, Barito is in 12th position with 29 points from 26 matches (M7 S8 K11).
In the last two matches, after winning 1-0 at home to Persebaya Surabaya, Persela were bent over by Kalteng Putra 0-2 and drew 1-1 at home to Bali United. Meanwhile, Barito won four times and only lost once in the last six matches.
In the previous week, Barito won 1-0 at home to Borneo FC. It became a good capital for them to go to Lamongan.
